root.name: Colin McRae Rally
root.description: OverviewColin McRae Rally is a racing game developed by Codemasters (PC and Playstation Versions) and Spellbound Entertainment (Game Boy Color Version).Colin McRae Rally was published by Codemasters (PC Versions and European Playstation Versions), THQ (Game Boy Color Version), Sammy Corporation (Original Japanese Playstation release), Spike Co. (Japanese Playstation Re-Release), and SCEA (US Playstation Version).
